tag_list: wireless, roaming, entrepreneur, mcmaster, engineer, executive, founder, ceo
overview:
Experienced executive in technology and business, having built and led teams across a diverse set of areas including Wireless, Networking, Software and Microelectronics.

Also, a serial entrepreneur and Founder of Gigsky, a global, mobile broadband data service provider and Kinaare Networks, which pioneered the development of a WiFi-based, Services Delivery Platform, for broadband services providers. Big Iron experience too with Sun Microsystems, Apple Computer and Nortel Networks.
